name: Crimson Knight - The Legendary Crystal Sword
name_original: Crimson Knight - The Legendary Crystal Sword
description:
This 3D adventure platformer is the result of applying my knowledge and what I have learned with James Doyle's udemy course (@gamesplusjames). 

Crimson Knight - The Legendary Crystal Sword combines 3D platformer levels with Sword infused power-ups and boss battles.
